meanings.definition: An exact copy or model of something, especially one on a smaller scale.
meanings.sent1: The toy cars on the shelf are replicas of real vehicles.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed replicas of ancient artifacts for visitors to see.
meanings.sent3: The replicas of famous landmarks in the theme park looked so tiny and cute.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like replicas of nature, capturing every detail perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The replicas of animals in the zoo were so lifelike, they seemed ready to move.

meanings.definition: A duplicate of an original object.
meanings.sent1: The artist created replicas of his paintings to sell to more people.
meanings.sent2: The scientist made replicas of the experiment to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent3: Seeing replicas of himself in the mirror maze made him laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a perfect replica of her mother's, showing their strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The replicas of the missing keys helped him remember where he left the originals.
